soundmark: /mɔr/ /ɪm'pɔrtnt/ /A是更重要的 A is more important/ /e/ /ɪz/ /mɔr/ /ɪm'pɔrtnt/
/ðæn/ /A比B是更重要的 A is more important than B/ /e/ /ɪz/ /mɔr/ /ɪm'pɔrtnt/ /ðæn/ /bi/
/'dɪfɪkəlt/ /A比B是更难的 A is more difficult than B/ /e/ /ɪz/ /mɔr/ /'dɪfɪkəlt/ /ðæn/ /bi/

english: Chinese  is  more  difficult  than English
Chinese  is  the  most  difficult language

chinese: 中文是世界上最难的语言
english: Chinese  is  the  most  difficult language in the world
this   is   the   most   difficult problem

chinese: 这是在世界上最困难的问题
english: this   is   the   most   difficult problem in the world
he is the most dangerous man

chinese: 他是在世界上最危险的人
english: he is the most dangerous man in the world

chinese: 他们是比你以为的更危险的
english: they  are  more  dangerous  than you think
time is the most valuable thing

chinese: 我们拥有的最宝贵的东西
english: the most valuable thing we have

chinese: 时间是我们拥有的最宝贵的东，西
english: time is the most valuable thing we have

chinese: 时间比金钱是更宝贵的
english: time  is  more  valuable  than money
a new car is more expensive

chinese: 一辆新车比一辆旧车是更贵的
english: a  new  car  is  more  expensive than a used car

chinese: 你可以找到最贵的礼物
english: you can find the most expensive gift

chinese: 你可以找到的最贵的礼物
english: the most expensive gift you can find

chinese: 你可以找到的最贵的礼物
english: the most expensive gift you can find

chinese: 你应该买你可以找到的最贵的，礼物
english: you   should   buy   the   most expensive gift you can find

chinese: 你可以找到的最贵的礼物
english: the most expensive gift you can find

chinese: 你应该买给你的女儿你可以找，到的最贵的礼物
english: you  should  buy  your  daughter the most expensive gift you can find
this is the most expensive hotel

chinese: 这是在这个城市里最贵的旅馆
english: this is the most expensive hotel in the city
you are the most beautiful girl

chinese: 你是世界上最漂亮的女孩
english: you are the most beautiful girl in the world

chinese: 当你笑的时候你是更漂亮的
english: you  are  more  beautiful  when you smile

chinese: 你看起来是更漂亮的当你笑的，时候
english: you  look  more  beautiful  when you smile

chinese: 但是你看起来是更漂亮的当你，笑的时候
english: but  you  look  more  beautiful when you smile

chinese: 你是世界上最漂亮的女孩
english: you are the most beautiful girl in the world

chinese: 你是世界上最漂亮的女孩但是，当你笑的时候你看起来是更漂，亮的
english: you are the most beautiful girl in the world but you look more beautiful when you smile
